head.title: Apples with Lemon Juice and Cinnamon

directions.step:
Core and slice apple into 8 wedges, and arrange in a small bowl. Pour lemon juice over the apple wedges, and sprinkle cinnamon on top.
Source: Irene Rodriguez / Lisa Clarke
My mother suggested this snack to me many years ago, because I was a junk food piggy, and I found good things like apples to be really boring. It's really yummy, though, especially if you like things a bit tart.
